alert.note: Alert for Cocke (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 3:20PM CST until February 18 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Hancock, Grainger and Claiborne Counties. North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Hawkins, Sullivan and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Claiborne and Union Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Hancock and Lee Counties. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe, Sequatchie and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pigeon River at Newport TN. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs downstream from gage on Highway 25/70 and in the community of Edwina. Jimtown Road may be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 8.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EST /300 AM CST/.
